Plot: Travel writer Lemuel Gulliver takes an assignment in Bermuda, but ends up on the island of Liliput, where he towers over its tiny citizens.
Title: Gulliver's Travels
Writer: Joe Stillman (screenplay), Nicholas Stoller (screenplay), Jonathan Swift (book)
Actors: Jack Black, Jason Segel, Emily Blunt, Amanda Peet
tomatoConsensus: Though Jack Black is back doing what he does best, Gulliver's Travels largely fails to do any justice to its source material, relying instead on juvenile humor and special effects.
